nnsec.net
Class NetManager

java.lang.Object
  nnsec.net.NetManager

public class NetManager
extends java.lang.Object

NetManager class manages objects that implements NetIface interface and controls access to this objects.

Nested Class Summary
static class NetManager.NetLoadingException
          Exception thrown when trying to load a net from file, and then some error occurs.
 
Constructor Summary
NetManager()
          NetManager unique constructor, initializes netList with an empty list and sets the net id counter to zero.

loadNet

public int loadNet(java.lang.String filename)
            throws NetManager.NetLoadingException
Method that permits to load a new net from file.

Parameters:
filename - file on the filesystem.
Returns:
net associated identifier.
Throws:
NetManager.NetLoadingException - thrown when error occurs loading net.

reloadNet

public int reloadNet(int id)
              throws NetManager.NetLoadingException
Method that permits to reload a net previously loaded. It is useful when users modifies net description files.

Parameters:
id - net identifier.
Returns:
net associated identifier.
Throws:
NetManager.NetLoadingException - this method does not catch this exception from loadNet method.

unloadNet

public void unloadNet(int id)
Method that permits to unload a net previously loaded.

Parameters:
id - net identifier.

setNetStatus

public void setNetStatus(int id,
                         boolean stat)
This method allows to set the net status (availability).

Parameters:
id - net identifier.
stat - net will be available if sta is true.

setNetExtSize

public void setNetExtSize(int id,
                          int ext)
This method allows to set wrapped net hidden layer size.

Parameters:
id - net identifier.
ext - proposed external size.

lockNet

public NetIFace lockNet(int id)
Method that permits to retrieve net references. This controls net access throughout NetHandler class and returns only if net is available (lock-after control).

Parameters:
id - net identifier.
Returns:
wrapped net reference.

unlockNet

public void unlockNet(int id)
Method that permits to release previously locked net. This controls net access throughout NetHandler class.

Parameters:
id - net identifier.

Method that returns the scale associated with a specific net.

Parameters:

Returns:
net associated scale.

                        int scale)
Method that permits to set the scale associated with a specific net.

id - net identifier.
scale - new scale value.

updateNet

public boolean updateNet(java.lang.Object[] values)
Method that sets values for a specified net from an Object values array.

Parameters:
values - Object values array.
Returns:
true if net is updated, false otherwise.
